name: Slender Man Nights Hunter: Scary horror ghost Escape From Abandoned forest
name_original: Slender Man Nights Hunter: Scary horror ghost Escape From Abandoned forest
description:
Get ready to become the yummiest cake baker - Make the sweet and delicious cakes, drinks and ice cream!

~~~~It's a time to make your own sweet cake****Play a super fun new Kids Cake Maker game today~~~~

Emily Birthday's party is coming! You are only one to prepare a surprise party for her! Make sweet cake, delicious drinks, yummy ice cream with different topping and flavor>

Make sure to decorate & make a delicious birthday cake? Yummy, Awesome and Delicious Cake!

Are you feeling hungry? Try to mix all the ingredients and bake cake! This beautiful app will make you feel like delicious and real cake! Wow it;s yummy! What are you waiting for? Get start to mix all ingredients and bake cake!

We all love delicious yummy cake. It's lots a Fun baking game! Yes, you'll be the most fabulous cake maker You can make whatever you like. Let's go.

Game Features!
- A super fun cake baking game.
- Tons of mouth-watering cake recipes that will look delicious
- Decorate your cakes with yummy adorable toppers, yummy cone flavor and much more
- Make super cool drinks, slushy, snow ice cream
- Make the Birthday party extra festive with your own cute decoration
- Try to some unique food decoration: fruits, ice cubes, water, cone and so much more
- Create all kinds of cake from scratch.
- Make cool drinks perfect for summer

And stay tuned for our next best cooking games we are going to make some more tasty and delicious food games. What a joyful game Download Kids "Cake Maker Food Cooking Games for girls" and start to make strawberry cake, chocolate cake, pancake, soda drinks, ice cream, slushy and much more.

Leave a rating and review! Let us know what you think about this game we will use your feedback in our upcoming updates! Thanks for Playing~~~~~
